item.title: vim+markdown-preview.nvim搭建markdown实时预览开发环境
item.description: 为什么需要markdown markdown是一种语法极简单的标记语言，基于markdown的文本代码可以很方便的渲染成html文件， 在网站上

item.title: Mac版UniAccess卸载方法
item.description: 为什么要卸载UniAcess? 很多公司用联软的UniAcess监控员工电脑，后台运行的时候占用大量CPU和网络资源， 上网速度受到很大影响，甚

item.title: macos下的效率工具
item.description: 我在macOS下常用到的效率工具。 键盘按键映射 Karabiner Elements—免费。 作为mac下功能最强大的按键映射工具，它支持simple

item.title: About
item.description: this is private blog of YLShi Usually I use picture bed to display png, sometimes I also use base64 to present png in markdown, but it will cost a little long time to load the png when you visit the content first time.

item.title: vim+plantuml-previewer绘制流程图
item.description: 传统画流程图的痛点 我们经常需要画流程图来表示代码逻辑或者基本框架等。但我们在绘画流程图的时候，经常会在对齐连接线这些和流程图表达的意义无关的

item.title: 使用vim+vimtex+latex(beamer) 制作PPT
item.description: beamer和powerpoint的不同 我们经常需要用ppt这一形式来展示我们的工作成果，但众所周知，微软的powerpoint是收费软件，

item.title: Theme Overview
item.description: This site provides a demo for the Even theme for the Gutenberg static site generator. Even was designed by Vincent Prouillet and was based on the Even Hugo theme by olOwOlo. This demo site was built by Daniel Sockwell. Both the theme and this site are licensed under the MIT license, so you may freely use and redistribute either for commercial or non-commercial work. You can find the source code for this site in its GitHub repository and can find the source code for the theme in the Even repository.

This demo site was built by Daniel Sockwell. Both the theme and this site are licensed under the MIT license, so you may freely use and redistribute either for commercial or non-commercial work.
